result.eng: It was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ga: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.orig: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.html: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradhIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ponchtml: B'iad na Normannaiġ a ṫosaiġ an nós féasóg a ḃearraḋ agus gruaig a ġearraḋIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.

result.ga: Cén t-am a thosaigh an cruinniú
result.orig: Cén t-am a thosaigh an cruinniú
result.html: Cén t-am a thosaigh an cruinniúWhen did the meeting start?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ṫosaiġ an cruinniúWhen did the meeting start?

result.eng: He grabbed the microphone and started singing.
result.ga: Fuair sé greim ar an mhicreafón agus thosaigh ag canadh
result.orig: Fuair sé greim ar an mhicreafón agus thosaigh ag canadh
result.html: Fuair sé greim ar an mhicreafón agus thosaigh ag canadhHe grabbed the microphone and started singing.
result.ponchtml: Fuair sé greim ar an ṁicreafón agus ṫosaiġ ag canaḋHe grabbed the microphone and started singing.

result.eng: At the start of the seventies people started to return home.
result.ga: I dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaile
result.orig: I dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaile
result.html: I dtús na seachtóidí thosaigh daoine ag filleadh ar ais abhaileAt the start of the seventies people started to return home.
result.ponchtml: I dtús na seaċtóidí ṫosaiġ daoine ag filleaḋ ar ais aḃaileAt the start of the seventies people started to return home.

result.eng: He lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.
result.ga: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caint
result.orig: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caint
result.html: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caintHe lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.
result.ponchtml: Las sé toitín úr agus ṫosaiġ ag caintHe lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.

result.html: Mise a thosaigh an próiseasI started the process.
result.ponchtml: Mise a ṫosaiġ an próiseasI started the process.

result.html: Thosaigh an bhliainThe year started.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ an ḃliainThe year started.

result.eng: His health started declining and he died.
result.ga: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé bás
result.orig: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé bás
result.html: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé básHis health started declining and he died.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ an tsláinte ag meaṫ air agus fuair sé básHis health started declining and he died.

result.eng: People started getting off the train.
result.ga: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.orig: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.html: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.

result.html: Thosaigh siad do mo cheistiúThey started questioning me.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ siad do mo ċeistiúThey started questioning me.

result.eng: She started taking her clothes off.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí di
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag baint a cuid éadaí diShe started taking her clothes off.

result.eng: She started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a ḃí sí seaċt mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.

result.eng: She started giving out to Séamus.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag tabhairt amach do Shéamus
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag tabhairt amach do Shéamus
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag tabhairt amach do ShéamusShe started giving out to Séamus.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag taḃairt amaċ do ṠéamusShe started giving out to Séamus.

result.eng: The crowd started yelling and clapping.
result.ga: Thosaigh an slua ag liú agus ag bualadh bos
result.orig: Thosaigh an slua ag liú agus ag bualadh bos
result.html: Thosaigh an slua ag liú agus ag bualadh bosThe crowd started yelling and clapping.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ an slua ag liú agus ag bualaḋ bosThe crowd started yelling and clapping.

result.eng: In 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
result.ga: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad Deara
result.orig: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad Deara
result.html: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad DearaIn 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
result.ponchtml: I 2000 ṫosaiġ sé ag foġlaim eitilte i ḃFlorida in éindí le Marḃan Al-Seiṫí agus Siad DearaIn 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.

result.eng: Reports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ga: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.orig: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.html: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ tuairiscí ag teaċt as Waẛington gur buaileaḋ an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.

result.eng: She got hold of the microphone and started singing.
result.ga: Ghlac sí seilbh ar an micreafón agus thosaigh sí ag canadh
result.orig: Ghlac sí seilbh ar an micreafón agus thosaigh sí ag canadh
result.html: Ghlac sí seilbh ar an micreafón agus thosaigh sí ag canadhShe got hold of the microphone and started singing.
result.ponchtml: Ġlac sí seilḃ ar an micreafón agus ṫosaiġ sí ag canaḋShe got hold of the microphone and started singing.

result.eng: It wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ daoine geala ag breaṫnú ar ḋaoine gorma mar ḟo-ċineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.

result.eng: It wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochtaIt wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ feaċtais in aġaiḋ na scláḃaíoċtaIt wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
